article_title: A critical moment in Israel's war in Gaza.
sentence: Israel  accused  Sinwar  of  having  masterminded  the  unprecedented  7  October  attacks,  that  killed  around  1,200  people  in  Israel  and  saw  251  taken  hostage  last  year.

article_title: A critical moment in Israel's war in Gaza.
sentence: Earlier,  Gaza's  Hamas-run  Civil  Defence  Agency  said  at  least  22  people  were  killed  in  an  Israeli  strike  on  a  school  building  in  northern  Gaza.
